This month Nick will be going over how to create a CV/Resume using the [vitae](https://pkg.mitchelloharawild.com/vitae/), [rmarkdown](https://rmarkdown.rstudio.com/), and [tinytex](https://yihui.org/tinytex/r/) packages, and then getting into our regular questions.
